sentences.chinese: 雪花輕輕地落在窗玻璃上。

sentences.english: You can by hand small pushes, so that lymph flow more smoothly.
sentences.chinese: 可以用手輕輕地推按，使淋巴的流動更順暢。

sentences.english: The breeze fanned our faces, please turn the fan off.
sentences.chinese: 微風輕輕吹在我們的臉上，請把電扇關掉。

sentences.english: One end of a tube is gently inserted into the rectum.
sentences.chinese: 管的一頭輕輕伸入直腸。

sentences.english: Pushing it softly open and tiptoeing in, I found all quiet inside, and my wife fast asleep.
sentences.chinese: 輕輕地推門進去，什麼聲息也沒有，妻已睡熟好久了。

sentences.english: The bird pecked finish, gently comb with rice sleek feathers.
sentences.chinese: 鳥兒啄完稻穀，輕輕梳理着光潤的羽毛。

sentences.english: Catkins do know how to touch my hair.
Try breathing easily and gently tell yourself to relax.
sentences.chinese: 讓呼吸平靜下來，輕輕告戒自己放鬆心情。

sentences.english: If the person next to you is asleep, gently wake him or her up.
sentences.chinese: 如果你身邊的人睡着了，輕輕地把他或她喚醒。

sentences.english: Net curtains blow slightly in the breeze.
sentences.chinese: 紗網窗簾被微風輕輕吹拂。

sentences.english: The melt of slim yellow and pink is deducing the subject of love forever.
sentences.chinese: 昏黃與粉色調的交織，輕輕演繹永久不變的愛的主題。

sentences.english: The gentle wind, blowing open your petty brow tight, so fly back all the worry.
sentences.chinese: 輕輕的風，吹開你緊瑣的眉頭，讓所有的愁向後飛去。

sentences.english: It took three putts before he got the ball in the hole.
sentences.chinese: 他輕輕打了三下才把球打進洞。

sentences.english: The youth imagined he was out of sorts, and set to whistling softly.
sentences.chinese: 小夥子以爲他情緒不好，就輕輕吹起了口哨。

sentences.english: With a scream of braking, the life of Yingzi flew up gently.
sentences.chinese: 隨着一陣拔尖的煞車聲，櫻子的一生輕輕地飛了起來。

sentences.english: The coaches told me to dunk, but I would lay the ball in.
sentences.chinese: 教練要求我去灌籃，但我會把球輕輕的放進籃筐。

definition: to bow the head/to yield/to give in
to push open (a gate etc)/to push away/to reject/to decline
one side/either side/on the one hand/on the other hand/doing while
(of a person) to turn round/to face about/(of a widow) to remarry (archaic)
